emailFormat: Email must be in the correct form.
meta-description: Here will be the final description that will be included in the Metadata in the HEAD of the page
passwordMin2Digits: Password must have at least 2 digits.
passwordMin2Capitals: Password must have at least 2 capital letters.
passwordMin2SmallLetters: Password must have at least 2 lowercase letters.
passwordMin2SpecialChars: Password must have at least 2 special characters.
